name: Gob Out
description:
Welcome to Gob-Out, another game from mathantastic procutions, this is Gob-Out!

On it, you have to protect this castle from an infinite wave of goblins, using these 2 types of warriors, the knight, and the archer, and there also are 2 types of goblins, the sword goblin, and the archer goblin.

This is an RTS game that will be posted on the GMTK 2020 Game Jam, if you want to follow how I did it, I will post a devlog about it on my youtube channel, so go follow it!

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCyFh4z_TxzxhQtzkIKssWIw
